mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_title, account_no) values(#{boardNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{accountNo})
mapper.select: with guest_board as ( select bm.board_no, b.board_title, b.account_no as creator_no from board_member bm join board b on bm.board_no = b.board_no where bm.account_no = #{accountNo} and bm.account_no != b.account_no ) select gb.board_no, gb.board_title, gb.creator_no, a.account_nickname from guest_board gb join account a on gb.creator_no = a.account_no
select count(*) from board_member where board_no = #{boardNo} and account_no = #{accountNo}
